body_content.explanation: eligible (= having the necessary qualities or satisfying the necessary conditions) for something again, for a second, third, etc. time:
examples: We have received the fee, and she is now re-eligible to compete.
He has been suspended and becomes reeligible for rugby next September.

body_content.explanation: able to be elected again to the same position, for a second, third, etc. time:
examples: All members hold office for three years, after which they are re-eligible, and are almost invariably re-elected.
